entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • c# - Renaming a field can cause it to rename the same word in the comments in other files in the same project that are completely unrelated #74577
  • Strange Exceptions During Binding #74574
  • Raw string literals should be reindented like any code #74578
  • Inellisense popup for XML documentation should honor Whitespace in ALL elements #74569
  • MS.CA.LanguageServer depends on MS.VS.Telemetry via Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Remote.Workspaces #74568

Closed

  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName from CompilerVisibleItemMetadata #74533
    17.13
  • lang=sql support #74572
  • Visual Studio insists on autocorrecting the method name I type to a similarly named field #74482
  • CSharpSemanticModel.GetSymbolInfo returns SymbolInfo with Symbol equal to null #74537
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35125.232 #74573
  • Nuget Package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces 4.5.0 is broken. #74571
  • CS8795 reported when expression with reference to another assembly happen #73964
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35125.79 #74565

PullRequests

Created

  • Erase extension types eagerly during translation of type symbols to Cci entities. #74576
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Move 'generate XXX' code fixers down to code-style layer. #74567
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • DocumentState constructors refactoring #74559
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Eliminate contentChanged parameter #74561
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cherry-pick #74507 #74560
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix race condition in LSP FindAllReferences when linked files were involved. #74566
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix dll load issue when loading Razor projects in VSCode #74570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Do not parse methods with accessibility modifiers as local functions (alt) #74495
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove a closure allocation from WrappedNavigationBarItem.ctor #74563
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move code to code style layer #74547
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Rename Suggestions: Fix getting of the context string, gracefully handle errors #74564
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Expose inlay hints to Razor cohosting #74548
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Implement support for partial properties #74494
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make it possible to build/run tests on linux-arm64 #74536
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid optimizing away ref array access #74553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
